subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: At 17, Maria Sharapova won her first major title as the 13th-seeded player at Wimbledon. Since then, she has reached five Grand Slam semifinals and lost them all.
snippet: At 17, Maria Sharapova won her first major title as the 13th-seeded player at Wimbledon. Since then, she has reached five Grand Slam semifinals and lost them all.
